statement.p: In the diagram below, the circle has a radius length of\displaystyle{r}={2} . If the measure of arc \displaystyle{A}{B}={17} °, then what is the area of the unshaded part of the circle \displaystyle{O}?
Area of unshaded part of circle \displaystyle{O}= \displaystyle{u}{n}{i}{t}{s}^{{2}}
